title: Re-selling of used children ' s clothing and books
subtitle: The regulations that entered into force in February 2009 will prohibit the resale of used child products that have not been tested for lead and fuses?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The regulations that entered into force on 10 February 2009 prohibit the sale of used children ' s products that have not been tested and adopted as meeting the new criteria for the content of lead and filaments.
